text: Mighty Rivers may refer to: *"Mighty Rivers", 1985 song by Graham Parker and The Shot from Steady Nerves. *"Mighty Rivers", 2010 song by Kylie Minogue from Aphrodite. *"Mighty Rivers", 2011 song by John Wetton from Raised in Captivity. It may also refer to: *Jeremy Wade's Mighty Rivers, 2018 Animal Planet TV show hosted by Jeremy Wade. == See also == * Mighty River (disambiguation)
title: Mighty Rivers
